item.description:
Here's the deal: Alpaca "open farm" days are Oct. 27 & 28 (not
this weekend, as I was thinking), and the farm Pam had read about
is SeaHill in Kittery Seahill Farm

However, if you click on logos on the Links page
Links, you'll see that other
Maine farms also have open farm day that weekend.

If anyone is interested in going either Saturday or Sunday please RSVP and we could organize a carpool and go together.


Directions to Sea Hill Farm:

From Interstate 95 take Exit 2 - Kittery, Maine.
Follow 236 South to the Kittery Traffic Circle. Turn right at the Bagel Caboose and follow 236 which becomes Rt. 103 East.
From the exit it is 3.6 miles to the Kittery Point Citgo Station where you bear left at the triangle onto Haley Road. The Fire Station and Baptist Church will be on your left.
Sea Hill Farm is the second driveway on the right.
item.name: Alpaca Open Farm Days October 27 or 28
